name: SoShea Butter
description: SoShea Butter is a moisturizing hair and body butter. It contains 100 % Natural unrefined Shea butter, Soy Butter made with non GMO-modifed soybeans, Soy Oil, Sunflower Oil, and Green Tea extract. This butter melts right in to skin and hair and can be used as a scalp soothing treatment. It is still light enought to use during the hot summer months. Shea butter is soothing and protects skin from UV rays. It can be used to soothe sunburns. Soy Butter re-hydrates skin and hair, and is rich in Omega 3 fatty acids and Vitamin E Sunflower Oil is very light, and readily absorbs in to the skin and hair. Green Tea Extract is rich in anti-oxidants which help to repair skin and hair. 6 oz Ingredients - Glycine Soja(soy) butter, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Glycine Soja(soy) oil, Helianthus annuus (Sunflower) oil, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) oil, Lavandula angustifolia (lavender) essential oil, Citrus racemosa (pink grapefruit) essential oil, Green Tea Extract, Cosmocil CQ(a natural, paraben free preserative).

name: Head-to-Toe Castile Soap
description: This castile soap is made with Chamomile and our 'Growth' Essential oils to strengthen hair and encourage hair growth. It can also be used as a body wash, as chamomile extract is soothing and anti-inflammatory. Lavender is healing on the skin and scalp, as well as rosemary. Ingredients: Filtered Water, Olive Oil, Glycerin, Coconut Oil, Borax (natural emulsifier and water softner), Growth Essential Oil complex, Chamomile extract, Pomegrante mango Fragrance

name: Organic Jojoba Growth Moisturizing Conditioner
description: Our organic jojoba conditioner moisturizes and conditions hair from the inside-out! Handcrafted with hemp seed oil, organic unrefined jojoba oil, and wildcrafted babassu butter, this conditioner is nice and thick and will balance your hair's moisture levels, and strengthen it at the same time. This conditioner features our special 'Growth' Essential oil complex. Its a special blen of cedarwood, rosemary and lavender essential oils. These oils are proven to stimulate hair growth. Pomegrante Mango scented. Featured Ingredient - Hemp Seed Oil Hemp Seed oil is very high in Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids, which are responsible for the luster in your hair. Hemp seed oil readily binds to the hair shaft allowing hair to absorb its many vitamins and minerals it contains, and makes hair stronger. Ingredients -Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Hemp Seed Oil, Organic unrefined Jojoba oil, Wildcrafted Babassu butter, vegetable wax, emulsifying wax, Honey extract, Collagen, panthenol DL, Vitamin E, Lecithin, Rosemary Extract, Grapefruit Seed extract, Potassium sorbate(food grade preservative), vitamin C, Our Specialty Growth Essential Oil Formula, Chamomile extract, Pomegrante Mango Fragrance.

name: Daily Moisturizing Creme
description:
Will not leave build up on your hair!
Made with Wildcrafted Shea, Mango and Babassu butters,  organic aloe vera juice, organic unrefined jojoba oil, organic coconut oil, Sweet Almond Oil, ester wax (veggie based), emulsifying wax, honey extract, collagen, panthenol DL, vitamin E, lecithin, rosemary extract, grapefruit seed extract, potassium sorbate (food grade preservative), and ascorbic acid (vitamin C).

This is a light creme, perfect for the summer and great for wash and gos!

name: Organic Coconut Buttercreme
description: Our 6 oz Organic Coconut Buttercreme is a moisturizer that is thick, but will not leave your hair feeling oily or weighed down. It contains Organic Coconut Oil, which is an excellent styling and moisturizing aid. Featured Ingredient - Aloe Vera Juice Aloe Vera had numerous applications when it comes to skin. The hair is no different. It contains vitamins C and folic acid, which can promote hair growth. Aloe vera juice is used to keep scalp ahd hair healthy in the regions of the world in which it is grown. Ingredients - Organic Coconut Oil, Soy Butter, Aloe Vera Juice, Sunflower Oil, Liquid Silk, Nettle Extract, Panthenol DL, Fragrance.
